menu_inventory_description: Drag items from to the Inventory button to store them there. Tap on an item to put it on the board.
menu_inventory_pause: NOTE: Timers in the Inventory are paused!
energy_menu_label_a: Generating new items costs energy. Buy more Energy by watching an Ad or by using Gems.
follow_menu_rate_label_1: Then please follow us to stay up to date!!!
note_menu_purchase_slow_text_a: Please wait till we handle your purchase! This usually takes 1-2 minutes.
note_menu_purchase_slow_text_b: If it takes too long, it might mean that your card has declined
note_menu_purchase_failed_declined: Your payment was declined. Try again later!
note_menu_purchase_failed_unavailable: In App Purchasing is disable in the settings
note_menu_purchase_failed_other: Failed to purchase the selected product. Try again later!
note_menu_not_enough_gold_text: You don't have enough Gold. Buy some from the Store.
note_menu_not_enough_gems_text: You don't have enough Gems. Buy some from the Store.
note_menu_energy_ad_error_1: An error occurred when loading the ad
note_menu_energy_ad_error_2: Check your network or try again later!
note_menu_log_in_already_Google: You are already logged in to Google.
note_menu_log_in_already_Facebook: nYou are already logged in to Facebook.
note_menu_log_in_already_Apple: You are already logged in to Apple.
note_menu_log_in_failed_Google: Logging in to Google failed. Try again later!
note_menu_log_in_failed_Facebook: Logging in to Facebook failed. Try again later!
note_menu_log_in_failed_Apple: Logging in to Apple failed. Try again later!
level_menu_label: Collect more Experience to level up!
level_menu_rewards_label: Your rewards for reaching the next level:
terms_menu_label: By tapping the "Accept" button, you agree with our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
age_menu_label: Please select your age to continue.
confirm_label_need_gold: You don't have enough Gold! Buy some in the Shop!
confirm_label_need_gems: You don't have enough Gems! Buy some in the Shop!
confirm_label_exit: Are you sure you want to Exit the game?
confirm_label_reset: Are you sure you want to Reset the game? This action can't be undone! All your progress will be deleted!
confirm_label_locale: Please restart the game for the changes to take effect!
confirm_label_sell_gen: This item is rare and can be hard to get back!
confirm_label_sell_log_out: Are you sure you want to log out?
update_menu_label: A new version is available, please update the game to continue playing!
